0.title: [stationName] Annual Average Temperature
0.caption: Average annual temperature. The lowest (min) and highest (max) temperature of the year.

1.title: [stationName] Annual Average Temperature Difference from Baseline
1.subTitle: Difference between yearly average and average for [baseline]
1.caption: Difference between the yearly average temperature and the average temperature for the baseline period, typically 1961 to 1990.

2.title: [stationName] Warmest [unit] of the year
2.caption: Average temperature of warmest [unit] of the year.
